Package org.mmbase.applications.packaging.packagehandlers

Interface Summary
PackageInterface Interface for all the package handlers
 

Class Summary
BasicPackage BasicPackage, base class for packages
CloudModelPackage DisplayHtmlPackage, Handler for html packages
ConfigBasicPackage ConfigBasicPackage, Handler for configuration files
DataApps1Package  
DisplayHtmlPackage DisplayHtmlPackage, Handler for html packages
DisplayThemePackage DisplayThemePackage, Handler for theme packages
FunctionSetPackage FunctionSetPackage, Handler for html packages
JavaJarPackage JavaJarPackage, Handler for installing jar files
PackageContainer The package container, this is a class that might confuse you at first its goal is to be a 'alias' for the 'best' available version of a package and a access point to all other versions of the package it has access too.
PackageVersionContainer The package version container, keeps all track of all the packages with the same version (but multiple providers)
